website_summaries.verdict: A well-made set that's ideal for groups of kids, but serious players may find the inaccuracies annoying.
pros: Set with 4 guns featuring 4 settings each that add to the action-packed fun
Falls on the middle of the price scale
cons: Some sets arrived with guns that malfunctioned with basic use
Not always accurate at pinpointing and hitting targets

customer_reviews.title: Fun BUT won't send new gun to replace one that quit working in less than 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: My son, nephews, and my son's friends love it. BUT the green gun quit working within 10 minutes of putting batteries in it. I emailed them, they said they'd send me a new green gun. It's now been a month and have yet to receive the new gun. What the hell?!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: These guns are not very sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: These guns are not very sturdy at all. We've only have them for a month and two of them are already broken. I would not recommend these guns if your kids are remotely rough with their toys. Both guns have broken simply from being dropped by a 3 year old. Obviously I realize they're not intended to be dropped, but a little sturdiness in toys for kids is expected. We have a different brand of laser tag guns that have held up for years. I went with this brand to get more guns. Should have stuck with the tried and true. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the next generation will be better.
customer_reviews.text: So close, but still a fail. On the top front of the gun is a black translucent piece. At first glance this would appear to be the hit sensor, allowing a hit from all sides. Unfortunately the hit sensor was not placed in this perfect location - instead it is on the front of the gun, below the emitter opening. This means the gun is only oriented to detect shots from the front. Too bad - good tag strategy is to attack from the side or back. The two buttons to change team modes and shooting modes are unlabeled. Not cool to have to carry the instructions with you to know the buttons and the options.
customer_reviews.author: SnoopyDog4Good

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective and missing internal parts(coil). Only 3/4 guns worked straight out of the box. We bought these to replace another set that broke. Now we can't play as a family. Update: I emailed the company and they offered to replace the defective gun under their 90 day purchase warranty. I received the replacement within 5 business days!
customer_reviews.author: EFrank

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 laser guns work!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my son’s birthday. He was super excited to open it up and get started playing...but then one of the screws was completely stripped on one of the laser guns. This prevented me from putting batteries into it, meaning that we had just 3 instead of 4. I hope that KidzLane will fix this issue so that we have 4 working laser guns.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A ton of fun so far
customer_reviews.text: The laser tag system has been a blast.. sorry for the pun, so far. Time will tell how well they hold up but they seem well made overall. The only thing I do not like is the on/off switch. It is relatively flimsy and seems like the one weak link with the actual gun. I also don't like how the gun doesn't default to the color of the gun when you are selecting teams. This isn't a deal breaker by any means but something that could make it a smidge easier for younger kids to use. Otherwise they are really fun and seem to be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of the 4 guns would turn on but not respond to any buttons after being turned on. The 4th one acted like the on off switch didn't work properly and would only turn on if you held the switch just right. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gerken

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- Seriously disappointed with product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two sets of Kidzlane Laser Tag set for a birthday party of five 10 year olds kids. Used 5 guns only once, figured they could be used repeatedly for parties. I was preparing the guns for my 14 yr old daughter’s birthday party this month, noticed one gun does not work, doesn’t turn on at all. Another gun will turn on but not reload. I paid over $100 for 2 sets and 5 guns were only used once, 3 guns never used. Only six guns of the eight guns work as they should. Seriously disappointed. For over $100 spent, they should have worked and/or lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas for our two sons ages, 13, and 11 after reading reviews. Two days later and the whole family including 70 year, Nana is having a blast! Great gift for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Tierney

customer_reviews.title: So much fun and no clean up!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. My 5 year old has been into nerf guns, but they’re a pain to clean up after, and someone always manages to get upset. These are great because there is no clean up of darts. Every time my son asks me to play with him I sigh, but once I get up I get totally into it feel like a kid again. Haha Also, when they first arrived one of the guns didn’t work. We called the company and they immediately sent a replacement. Great customer service! (And perfect because our 1 year old can use the broken one and feel like he’s involved, ha!)
customer_reviews.author: hapamama

customer_reviews.title: These guns are easy to use and provide lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my husband for Father's Day so we can play any time we want. Game one throughout the house went down last night and everyone had a blast. These guns are easy to use and provide lots of fun. I'm pretty sure I should buy stock in batteries for these things because they will be played with nonstop! ***UPDATE**** We purchased a second set so we can play with more people and we have a blast. Our second set did come with a glitchy green gun and customer service is sending us a new one! Customer service can make or break a company and this company has a great one!
customer_reviews.author: LandEMommy

customer_reviews.title: Fun -- but received 2 sets and only 3 worked in each set
customer_reviews.text: These guns are fun when they work, but we received one set for Christmas and the orange gun didn't work. Amazon was great and sent a second set. In the second set, we had the same problem again with the orange gun. In the second set, the red gun was also making some odd noises. We returned them and are looking for another option. I'll give them two stars because when they work, they are fun. No nerf darts to pick up or be hit with. And I have seen kids just scatter to the wind with them in the backyard. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: JuleNY

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 6 year old son's birthday. He absolutely loves them. They provide hours of fun and imaginative play. Unfortunately, after about 6 weeks of use, three of the guns stopped working. The return window with Amazon had closed so I contacted Kidzlane customer service directly. I wanted to see if I could exchange them for working toys. Their customer service really blew me away. I had a response to my email within the hour. They asked a few questions and we emailed back and forth. After a few emails they offered to replace the toys free of charge. Bottom line, I would recommend this toy and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen P.

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months, stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well out of box but 3 months later, 2 of the 4 lasers are not working. Would like to get these two replaced fron the company.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and such an awesome price! So nice not having to use a phone or vest as a "target", especially with younger children. Our 5 year old loves laser tag and now we can play whenever. There is one small thing I would like to change. When selecting a fun an option of identifying the secrets gun would be nice, since you won't know unless you keep track in your head, or until you shoot it (makes different firing noises). But without an indicator, you can change it to a different gun without everyone knowing what that is, so that's a personal preference. Overall, awesome buy. Made my 5 year old very happy on his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Snowberger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, very inaccurate. Your can be in the other room and you take hits. Almost not fun.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun while they last
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed to be writing a poor review for these. My son received these for Christmas and was, without a doubt, his favorite gift. Unfortunately, we only got about 3-4 months use out of them before they started dying off. We are now down to only one gun working. One won't reload anymore, one just flashes all the time and won't shoot, and the other just died completely. It's such a bummer because we can no longer play with these together as only one works. Fun while they lasted 😔
customer_reviews.author: M2J1026

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Broke within 1 day on use.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Broke within 1 day on use. Triggers hard to pull
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The tip of the gun got broken but in questioning found they were using it as a sword fight but gun still worked fine. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Gave to 8 yr old for his birthday. There's a lot of kids in family which is why I bought the 4 gun model. It was a huge hit. Finding a Phillips head screw driver was the only hard thing about getting it ready to play. The tip of the gun got broken but in questioning found they were using it as a sword fight but gun still worked fine. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item specifically for a trip to the poconos for the kids. It arrived in good time too. I ordered enough batteries and they lasted the entire week end. The kids only used them at night. They turned off all the lights upstairs and were running around like crazy for hours. The 6 year old was beet red and had to stop to drink water he was sweating so much. I’m so glad I bought them something to keep them occupied before we went out the next day other then they being stuck watching to tv. At least they burn off some calories. It’s worth the money. I hope it lasts. They will be banged around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R

customer_reviews.title: KIDZLANE LASER TAG MEGA PACK
customer_reviews.text: These are a Christmas gift for my grandson,but my son did "check out" a gun and ran it through all the gun modes with their sounds-it was awesome he sent me the video. my grandson is going to LOVE them. Waiting on durability until he uses them but my son said they should be just fine!
customer_reviews.author: jo ann estep

customer_reviews.title: Laser tag
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old grandson's bd gift. He loves these, but just received so can't really speak to the durability long term. His favorite gift this year. I did a lot of research to pick these and liked the fact you didn't need to wear a vest to score (afraid vest might not be large enough if Dad and Uncle wanted to play with him). I also appreciated the fact this teaches to shoot for the gun hand.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Todsen

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying these for my (twin 9 year old) boys due to reviews about the loud sounds they produce. They really aren't that loud at all and can be muffled with a little bit of tape. We bought two sets and they've taken a beating. The aim is fairly good, the batteries seem to last a while, and the flexibility with teams and weapon options are great. I think a few other dads have gotten these since ours. Only drawback comes from the gun without chest target. Kids (and dads) can hide the gun behind a tree or leg and not get shot. We try to make rules, but that's tough...
customer_reviews.author: RickR

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: My kids, ages 3-36 (that includes my husband), all love these guns! You can play on teams or individually, and they seem to work well indoors or outside. They can even get all the kids outside in the wintertime...build a few snow barriers around the yard and let the fun begin! Stock up on batteries because they require 4 each, but seem to last quite a while, and while they don't have an auto-off function, they do make a noise periodically to remind you that they are still on, which helps to preserve batterly life, because, let's be honest, when has a kid every turned off a toy voluntarily?? (-;
customer_reviews.author: SNKJ

customer_reviews.title: A must during COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these for my daughter's birthday. We used these in the house and we have also used them at night when the weather permitted during social isolation. Pros: A great way to bring some family physical interaction, fun, & inside/outside physical activity. We have a household of 8. Cons: It is easy for kids o to cheat!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a fun item
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! The lasers can even rickashay off walls and the ceiling so you can do bank shots. They have difficulty settings and are very easy to use. Even my 6 year old has a great time with them and is able to use them easily. I would recommend them. Great price for a fun item! The battery life seems to be fairly good, too. My kids used them pretty non stop the first few days and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Taft

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale for about $38 and they were well worth it! The are very easy to operate - the kids figured them out very easily! The boys 2-1/2 and 5 years old played by themselves with them and the adults had fun with them too as 4 individuals or as teams. They played with them every day while they visited for Christmas. I was concerned they may not last, but so far, so good! I honestly feel like they were already worth the money with as much as they have played with them.
customer_reviews.author: “Woo”

customer_reviews.title: 1 Week in...
customer_reviews.text: I had this for one week and have used it multiple times with my kids and my friends kids. My wife and I also get in on the fun. They work pretty decently outside if you are in the Shade or afternoon lighting. Obviously the range goes down but still pretty decent. Pretty accurate and ultimately super worth the money. Time will tell about how long they last, but so far I'm so happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs.K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My children waited patiently for these to arrive. We stood outside and waited for the delivery. The delivery driver was wonderful. We unboxed the laser guns, Installed the batteries. My children had the time of their lives chasing each other around the yard playing laser tag. Well worth the investment. For the price that they cost is definitely worth it especially without having to wear the vest
customer_reviews.author: Chrome Alien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My kids picked this out as a gift for their 9-yo brother, and it has been perfect! They are easy to use, the batteries actually last longer than I expected (Christmas was only 20 days ago, but we haven't replaced them yet...they probably get played with for about an hour a week), and the sensors worked perfectly. My kiddos are 1-12 years old and they (and my husband and I) have all enjoyed playing with them! We actually bought two sets (because there are more than 4 people in our family, lol) and they work together great!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: 1st they are well built not chepo plastic last a day and done. They change colour sounds vibrate and everyone goes awesome. Easy to put batteries in easy to use good fun. I had 1 gun that would not reload spring stuck my guess Emailed them next morning got an email apologizing for this, asking for amazon number. Boom got it in 2 days. Kids happy. Not going to lie in 38 i see myself having as much fun as the kids. So so happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his 9th birthday. Works very well, as described, with different modes for "shooting," and the gun vibrates and makes noises both for "shooting" and when you've been hit. Distance seems reasonable; we have been playing outside in the park, and it works. It's probably a little less robust than some models that have the separate chest or arm receiver, but for younger kids it's definitely easier *not* to have those additional pieces. Would recommend this, good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TTAISI-Editor

customer_reviews.title: Kids Laser Tag
customer_reviews.text: Laser tag guns are very easy to use and offer lots of playing options including different weapons within the same gun. It’s fun and the kids enjoy playing it. My only issue is that it picks up a hit (being shot) with very in accurate shots, off by several feet (5-10 possibly). This is great for younger kids but frustrating for older kids. I wonder if there is a way to adjust the sensitivity, that would be a nice feature. It also makes a noise when hit which gives away hidden positions which also frustrates my older son who is all in to hiding and playing. Overall I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son and his friends love these guns. They even take them when I go shopping - one father saw them having a blast in the Nerf isle at Walmart and asked where I found them. I showed him the Kidzlane logo so he could find it online. One gun had to be replaced and that was quick and hassle free. You play on the honor system as you can reset your gun to start over, as long as no one hears the startup noise. But there are so many noise effects it could easily get drowned out.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Spallino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price
customer_reviews.text: Watched many reviews on laser tag units and this set lived up to reviews. Ease of use , grandkids had it figured out in seconds Works very well Durable lasted with 4 boys no issues Adults wanted and did play Well worth money. Excellent build quality and works as advertised Quick and good shipping Highly recommended I will buy another set before next gathering as my 4 year old granddaughters girls want their own.
customer_reviews.author: Tad D.

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Lukat brand laser guns and they were very hard to work with. When your 9 lives were up they wouldn’t respawn or reset. I sent it back and asked for a replacement and the same thing happened with the second set so I opted to try these and I absolutely love them so far. We haven’t played outside yet, but that is our next adventure as we just received these. My son and all players involved extremely enjoyed it. Highly recommend for now. If anything changes I will give an updated review.
customer_reviews.author: Tuti

customer_reviews.title: One arrived already broken.....
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons birthday party and it was a huge hit, except that we had to be one gun short. The blue gun arrived cracked and could just not be fixed or used. I have been wanting to return the package, but my son and friends play with it everyday and doesn’t want to loose out on any days until we get the new ones. Whishing there was an option to only return and replace one.....the other 3 work just fine. I wish there was a way to turn off or down the shooting volume. It gets to be pretty obnoxious after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old is obsessed with these! He got them for Christmas and it was hands down his favorite toy Christmas morning. We love that you don’t need extra targets or pieces. These are so easy to use and he loves that you can switch up the mode to rapid fire or rocket launch very easily. Hopefully by summer time he’s still a fan so that the kids can run around at night outside and play laser tag. Just make sure you purchase a hundred batteries to go with. Battery life is pretty decent but when they go they go and then you have a bunch of sad kids.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Get the kids outdoors, play hard, come home tired!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson’s birthday. I saw that there are dozens of laser tag toys on the market but this one had the best reviews. I guess the reviews were right! My daughter said my grandson and his buddies from the neighborhood play for hours outside, and their parents have to yell for them to come home and eat dinner. Just like the good old days! No sitting around playing video games for hours, but outside horsing around. I asked daughter if my son-in-law was getting in on the action too? She said “no, he can’t, the kids won’t give up a laser!”
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Most fun in the dark but still fun anytime.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! I gave it to my son for his ninth birthday and he and his friends had a great time running around the park playing. Paired it with a set of walkie-talkies and that was even more fun! Most fun after dark but, still fun in the light.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Terp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy, tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My wife found this as a gift for our nephew's 7th birthday, and boy am I glad she did! It was marked down for $50, and it was worth every penny. My nephew is obsessed with video games, and he also received a new game for his nintendo switch that he's been wanting, but instead of playing that, we ran around for hours playing laser tag with his 10 year old sister! These are an awesome, fun product for the whole family, and they seem pretty durable. The only thing is they take four AA batteries each, so make sure to buy a large pack of batteries with them!
customer_reviews.author: Spatton

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the price
customer_reviews.text: At 60 dollars this is a bargain for a great product. 4 laser tag pistols with ability to change between 4 types of weapons and 4 teams. Not just a toy for kids, adults can join in the fun. As an adult I kept beating the kids because I have steady aim and would do much better at long distances. At close quarters it seems like it would not miss. When the life bars are gone, the pistol is disabled. You can power it off and on to restart it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. Create rules before you play. Tune those rules for even more fun. Company has good customer support as well. Months after purchase, we still have so much fun. We bought two sets so we play with 8 guns. Also combined with other owners too for a 16 gun match. Easy to use. No other equipment needed....just the guns. I wish they had a death match option though. You have to select a among 1 if 4 teams.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: These guns are so much fun!! :D
customer_reviews.text: When the sun comes down during our family gatherings, all of the kids get ready to raid the yard and go into laser battle mode. Kidzlane's customer service alone is a great reason to invest in these products. We had an issue with one of our guns, which had a faulty team selection light. After contacting customer service, Kidzlane replaced it right away with zero hassle. Also, I highly recommend purchasing the rechargeable batteries to make the fun more worthwhile. We already have 11 of these bad boys and will probably buy more for our upcoming camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Just amaaaazing
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect!!! So much fun to play with, they have different colors for different teams, the battery lasts long. No volume control but the volume is not too loud and you can even find a lower volume shooting sound among the available options Bought 22 for my son's birthday. They all came on time, and perfectly working. The boys went crazy for the guns and were so happy to take them home
customer_reviews.author: Rehab kotb

customer_reviews.title: They all enjoy it. It gets them out of the house
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 11 year old. It was such a hit I purchased another one. He plays this with his cousins ranging from age 8 - 16. They all enjoy it. It gets them out of the house, running around and off their phones. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KB's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun, and nearly indestructable! We fell in love with them after playing with them at a friend's house, and so we bought some for our kiddo for Christmas. They are fun with just 2 people, but are also fun with 3 or 4. They are super easy to use, even our 2.5 year old picked up on how they work, and he was able to operate them independently. And adults love playing with them, too! There are few toys nowadays that have the ability to entertain a large age range, but this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: E. J.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These things are junk...the buttons got stuck, no vibration or lights after 2 months...a total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Emme W. ZPB

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fun for the low price
customer_reviews.text: These have been played with many hours a day since they arrived. Boys and girls aged 6-15 have all enjoyed these for hours at a time. They don’t work well outside in daylight - too many other sources of interference for the sensors. But they’re good outside at night, and good inside. As I write this review, I hear blast sounds and lots of excited voices and laughter coming from the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Reads

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A lot cooler than I had expected. I purchased these for my children in hopes of getting rid of the all the nerf bullets that are scattered throughout the house. That backfired. All the bullets are still flying. They have simply incorporated the laser guns into their battles. Still a great purchase and product.
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the order
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product as a birthday present for my son. One gun didn’t work so we sent all of them back for a replacement set. Now we can’t get any of them to work and the return window has expired. They are cool but don’t get this brand. They are not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: real shot gun and machine gun noises
customer_reviews.text: I really wish these didn't make such realistic shotgun and machine-gun noises. It's pretty disturbing to hear kids running around racking a shotgun - it would be nice if they actually made laser noises. Two of them also stopped working after being dropped just once on the lawn. I had to take them apart and reglue some pieces that had come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these things! They’re so much safer than the nerf guns my son has cause things aren’t flying at your face. They’re very easy to use and we had a blast playing with them in the dark. My 3 year old was able to play too!
customer_reviews.author: Kris P

customer_reviews.title: False labeling and advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Is really NOT an infrared laser at all! Point it where ever and pull the trigger for the same sounds, etc. This is a rip off. Grand kids quickly bored with these because they figured out no laser tag was ever occurring. They sit in a box and will likely never be used again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carl Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Considering these guns? DO IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST purchase we made for our kids this year at Christmas. I read the reviews before buying and could not agree more with all the positive feedback. These guns are awesome because they don't require anything more than batteries. They have different settings for the gun including: pistol, shotgun, sub machine gun, and rocket launcher. My boys range in age from 5 - 13 and they ALL LOVED these guns! I would HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Simons

customer_reviews.title: love them.  Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! Just like every game made from electronics that has ever been made, you're going to experience the occasional "this thing is cheating!!!" moment. But, honestly, it's more fun notwithstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Tex Wilbourn

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 8 years birthday present and I'm highly satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: I brought these guns for my 8 years birthday present and I'm highly satisfied so far. The price was good, they arrived on time and they are just as described. The reloading sounds and the ability to switch guns is probably the favorite feature. Two guns have been hanging off the ground from children falling with them and they still work so so far the quality seems good. He hasn't had them long but as of now he's happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely loved these guns! I have three girls so there was not only the perfect amount for them but even one for a friend! My only complaint was I wished the batteries lasted a little longer being that they require 4 batteries each. They did last for at least a couple of hours of play though. Might try a different type of battery next time. Still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kina Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Kinda work kinda don’t
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend getting a set with the chest sensor. The gun sensors On the gun only are finicky at best. We tested the range and it seems like it was more like 20-30 feet. The kids started running and playing but the sensors were so bad that by the end they were just standing gun to gun shooting. It’s cheap I get it but sometimes you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Erik the Wise

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: These guns are amazing!! So much fun with family and friends! We bought two packages of 4 guns each. You can have up to 4 different teams - the guns have a light on the side that you can change to whichever team you want to be on. There are multiple gun sounds you can cycle through on each gun - shotgun, pistol, etc. Super fun and well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids loved these
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandsons unfortunately the red gun did not work. The kids had alot of fun with the three that did work. They are easy to use my 4yr old had no problem mastering these. Would have gave 5 stars if they all worked right out of box.
customer_reviews.author: rdc

customer_reviews.title: 2 guns don’t work first time use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard great things about these guns in particular and they were a flash deal when I ordered them for Christmas back in October. The we almost 60% off so I thought I hit it just right! My kids just put batteries in them for the first time tonight and only 2 out of the 4 guns work!! I do not recommend these- I have some bummed out kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kid's
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our kids for Christmas and so far they have had a lot of fun with them. They have played with these more then there other gifts plus they get good exercise running around and it keeps them busy for a long while which is a real plus. Great gift for kids and the price is great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: My foster children and my grandchildren love them. They are having a blast running around ...
customer_reviews.text: My foster children and my grandchildren love them. They are having a blast running around and playing with them. I am very pleased with them. I just may be ordering more someday soon. The ages of my foster children ranges from 8 to 12 and my grandchildren are right in the middle of them. I got to say, my son who is 28 loves playing with them too.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas present for the grandkids,
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a Christmas present for my grandkids. Unfortunately one gun was defective which we didn’t find out until they had taken them home with them. I didn’t want to have to return all of them so I contacted the seller directly, explained the issue, and they worked with me to return the one defective gun and they sent me a replacement. The kids have a blast playing with these in the house and outside. I would not hesitate to order again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Loud but great fun!
customer_reviews.text: We've been enjoying these guns. I wish they had a way to turn down the volume a little, but otherwise, they are easy to figure out how to use (even my 5-year-old can play). We've played as teams, as individuals and even duel-style with the pistol shot to see who could "kill" the other person first.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with plus great support
customer_reviews.text: These guns are easy to use and allot of fun to play with. But what is more important than a good product is great support. Two guns stopped making shooting sound (which something that could happen with kids) when I contacted support they were very nice and sent replacement right away.
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukee User

customer_reviews.title: bottom reload button and easy operation
customer_reviews.text: My two grandsons , one 3.5 and the other 6.5 have a great time with these. we had a different set that had a chest target and had to snap the gun down sharply to reload while press the trigger. The older covered the target up and the younger could not get it to reload. The hit sensor is on the gun on this set, so if you are shooting you can get hit and the reload is simply to push a button on the bottom of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 8 year old. He didn't ask for this but it has been one of his favorite toys. His daddy, and I can play with him and then he and his cousins play with them too and they all enjoy them. They all get outside and move around, so any toy that gets my child out of the house and off of the couch is a good toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it and the still work, two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my nephews at Xmas. They really like playing with it and it seems to still be holding up to the rigors of indoor winter laser tag. As the receiver is on the guns it does make it a bit more challenging to score a hit as you have a small target. If these malfunction or something comes up I will update the review, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ollbuster

customer_reviews.title: Two Sets for Christmas = Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a set as a joint gift for our nephews, thinking they would enjoy them around their house and be able to each invite a friend. A couple days later, we talked about it and ordered another set for our own kids. Both sets were opened on the same day. Adults and kids alike had a great time pairing off in ad hoc teams and running through the house to the sounds of gunfire and laughter. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Engaging if you are creative.
customer_reviews.text: Kids are really liking these. We create our own games that keeps them engaged. Unfortunately one big draw back is that you can easily just turn the gun off and on to reset your life bars which would make it easy for kids to cheat while playing a round. The guns feel well made and sturdy and we have not had issues with functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Most fun our family has had ever!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on lazer tag sets. Vest vs no vest, laser beam vs no laser beam, flags and saftey goggles vs those without. I ended up with these and guess what. BIG SCORE FOR MOM! not only does my 6 year old love them but this toy has my whole family interacting and enjoying playtime and exercise. This is the lazer tag set for any family.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun! Better than Nerf!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets for my son's 8th birthday. No Regrets! So much better than a Nerf war and a lot less mess (nerf bullets everywhere). Guns have life bars, cool sounds, different light teams, they vibrate and different weapons w/ different kill strengths. We had everyone playing Lazer tag by the end of the day, young and old! In fact, we've had several games everyday since. I like this set up since its just the gun and I dont need to wear anything. Easy to learn how to use and great indoors and out. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BVentures

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! They don’t shoot real lasers beams (which was fine with me). I bought a few sets and ended up with 1 gun that only can be on “team red” for some reason? Otherwise, well made! Only thing I find subpar is you can’t tell which gym type you choose without listening to it fire first, but that’s not a big issue either. Kids LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: Stoughton Tumblers

customer_reviews.title: These are a Blast!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't expecting too much from these but they have been very entertaining for our family. My husband and I play with our two boys and sometimes the neighborhood kids (who enjoy them too). They feel great, not cheap and are easy to use. It's easy to switch to teams or individual play and so far the battery life has been impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelioos

customer_reviews.title: Decent gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift, they work good and were well liked. Good value for the product. Not really thrilled that theyre made in china, and unfortunately thats my problem. They havent abused too bad either, i dont know how well theyll hold up if dropped or something.
customer_reviews.author: Paul3Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My girls love these!
customer_reviews.text: Kept all six of my kids busy/entertained and they didn’t come in and complain about it not working or anything. THAT’s a huge win for me! My kids range from 6-13 and they could all understand how to use/play and enjoyed these guns! I purchased two 4 packs and one 2 pack for a total of ten guns for neighbors to join in the fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and the price is reasonable!
customer_reviews.text: The product is durable, the material it’s made out of is of great quality. I love the sound effects! I also love the fact that this particular laser gun can be used with or without the vest. I was so impressed by it that I purchased two more sets with vests and I’m fifty-five. Living, laughing and having lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Work exactly like you would hope
customer_reviews.text: Love these and the everyone has enjoyed playing with them night and day. Only thing I wish they had was an indicator on what type of gun was active (pistol, shotgun, etc). Will prob get used to the order they are in.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and great service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these items on a deal and held them as Christmas gifts for a few months. Our kids were thrilled to get them but we had problems with the orange guns not working. I contacted Kidzlane through the Amazon website and got friendly service and new guns sent out with no problem. Now if I can turn the sound off we'd be golden! :-)
customer_reviews.author: NearEastIndy Family

customer_reviews.title: Laser tag at home! My 9 year old self is screaming!
customer_reviews.text: We recently brought laser tag guns for my kids to play with friends in the house. The guns were so much fun. They arrived right on time and after putting in the batteries the kids were off. We brought two packs because they can be used today, either in doubles or quads. The kids had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We’ve played a few times. Great fun. The only down side are the realistic gun sound effects. I instructed my children to use settings that do not sound like a gun. A fun alternative to water guns to switch things up sometimes and a great way to get the kiddos outside for active play.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Life

customer_reviews.title: Big fun, small package.
customer_reviews.text: Fun, fun, fun! Our 8 year old Godchild loves them and even the adults had a blast playing with them as well. Easy to use, seems pretty durable, different fire modes are a nice option. Cool sounds and lights, even more fun running through the yard after dark. Kid approved.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Tanguis

customer_reviews.title: Fun Laser tag set, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My son got this laser tag set for his 9th birthday. He has enjoyed playing laser tag with his siblings and friends. A couple days after he got this, one of the guns stopped working. We tried new batteries but that didn’t work. All the other guns still worked and were being used regularly. So I emailed the seller and they responded within hours of my email. The next day they had a replacement gun in the mail. Their customer service surpassed my expectations. My son is excited to continue playing with his new laser tag guns, included the new replacement that arrived in the mail today. I would recommend this laser tag set.
customer_reviews.author: Momof6

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We borrowed these from a friend and liked them so much that we bought two sets or ourselves. They are really easy to use. The four shooting options and ease of changing teams keeps the game interesting. I also like having the receiving sensors on the gun itself so you are shooting the other person's gun, not the other person. But they do take a lot of batteries - 4 "AA" each and be sure to have extras on hand.
customer_reviews.author: USA - UK User

customer_reviews.title: Best gift Christmas 2018
customer_reviews.text: Best gift 2018 I bought 3 sets and they were easy to set up and start play. Daughter received a different type as a gift for her children they were terrible, these are the BEST. Daughter is returning the others to get these. No target vest just put batteries in and play. Also purchased laser bugs which were fantastic. Kids 5,6,7,8,9,and13.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets and gave them to my kids (6 and 3.5) for Christmas and next door neighbor (4.5). The kids had a blast and the adults may have enjoyed even more. The fact that they light up and have sounds without awkward vests was the most appealing for me and we were not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Haney

customer_reviews.title: The kids love fighting over these
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled that there were four, so there are extras when one of my three kids inevitably loses one or breaks it. My kids have already figured out how to cheat and hide the sensor from each other, so this is highly recommended if you enjoy hearing one child get pissed because the other keeps winning by cheating. Also so much fun to walk around the house and find the guns laying around without being turned off. 10/10 for keeping my kids in timeout. I would have loved these as a kid, but instead I was given mousetraps to play with. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric O.

customer_reviews.title: Really FUn!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! fun and they don;t make a mess. Our kids are into Nerf guns and this is a nice substitute because no one ends up crying because a nerf dark smacked their face. They seem accurate and easy to use as well. I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Berbaler

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 4-pack set for my 8 year old nephew so he could have friends over and play....and so Mom and Dad could play with them also. I was hoping the guns would not be too complicated for my nephew to change programs. Right out of the box, he did the set up and he and his 6 year old sister were off and running having a great time! They were a Christmas gift so I can't speak to longevity of the toys but so far it hasn't been necessary to change batteries and kids play with them constantly!! I'm so glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Soj

customer_reviews.title: These are a blast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son’s 8th Birthday and they have been a HUGE hit! They use a lot of batteries, but so far they have lasted a good amount of games without dying. I do wish the lives lasted longer during the game. I feel like we spend half of the time resetting the lives. But overall these laser tag guns have been nonstop fun! Watch the price; I bought them one day and by the time they were delivered the price went down $20.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrica Urban

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, the kids had a blast (and I did too!!)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a 10th birthday gift. It was an absolute hit. I was worried that in this time of video games and computer obsessions it wouldn't go over too well. But both he and his older brother took to this game immediately. I even joined in and had a blast! If I had one critique of the product itself, I would say that a visual indicator of which "gun mode" was currently selected would be really helpful. But honestly, everything works exactly as described and I can't believe the range! We were running all over the place!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: The lazer guns work fine- only complaint I have is ...
customer_reviews.text: The lazer guns work fine- only complaint I have is that it’s too difficult to tell IF and WHO is actually getting hit - NO CLEAR sound or signal that you’re hitting your target or being hit . Just a whole lot of shooting (sounds) !!!
customer_reviews.author: No BS

customer_reviews.title: Fun!  They work great!  Terrific customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 boys love playing with these guns! We use them inside and outside without any problems. You can create up to 4 different teams. We will likely buy another set of 4 so friends can join in! One of the guns we received broke after 2 weeks and the customer service was amazing and fast! They sent us a replacement of the 1 gun that broke, no questions asked. All our boys were back and playing in no time. If you are wondering if you should "pull the trigger" on this purchase, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: These guns are the best. My son received a set from my brother for his birthday and we ended up buying a 2nd set so we had 8 to play with friends. We have since decided to buy any kid we go to a birthday party these guns so we can get a fun group together.
customer_reviews.author: Shiikit

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality with good sound and the gun acts as the "hit detector" so no need for vests and therefore less batteries to burn through. Just put batteries in the guns and you're good to go. I was pleasantly surprised with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The guns look and sound very cool when using them
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to receive this item as we are babysitting our nephews (8 and 9yrs) this week. The guns look and sound very cool when using them, but unfortunately one of the guns doesn’t work. I was hoping to contact customer service to replace the one gun but couldn’t get in contact. It looks like I’ll have to return the whole set and order it again, but not sure t will be here in time to play with the kids :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift this Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun with these! My 4 year old and 12 year old play non stop! Probably our favorite gift from Christmas! Can easily switch guns to set up teams, different types of “guns” allow for different fire power. My entire family runs around the house and has team battles!!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship in battery terminal!
customer_reviews.text: So here I am. Putting batteries in these things so they can be played with first thing, and one doesn't work. The battery terminal is missing a spring for one of the terminals. So I'm down to three functioning weapons. Hopefully customer service isn't a hassle! Will update! Update! Customer promptly got in touch with me after the above review. They asked for pictures and once they received the pics they sent me a new gun to replace the inoperable one. Works great! lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kidzlane Laser Tag – Laser Tag Guns Set of 4 – Multi Function Lazer Tag Guns for Kids 4 Players – Indoor, Backyard, Outdoor Game for Kids, Adults, and Family
feature_bullets: 4-TEAM ACTION TOY ✨ Organize breath-taking battles with your friends and get hooked to the most amazing action game! Pick your team in bright GREEN, RED, BLUE or WHITE, and let the merciless wars begin!
PICK YOUR AMMO ✨ Select one of the 4 Gun Settings - PISTOL, SHOTGUN, SUBMACHINE GUN and ROCKET- and pulverize the enemy! Ultra-realistic shooting sounds accompany each setting for a riveting game!

TOP NOTCH QUALITY ✨ Immerse yourself in the action! These Laser Blasters light up and vibrate while shooting as far as 130ft! Each gun mode comes with a different range of life bars, available shots and booming sounds that will blow your mind!

SAFE PLAY ✨ With a Child Safety Infrared Signal Emission that is less than 1mW, this toy is certified safe for children of all ages. Best activity at parties and get-togethers- great for indoor and outdoor use!

AMAZING GIFTING IDEA ✨ Treat your little adventurers to the laser guns of his dreams and enjoy his ear-to-ear smile! Give him the high-end action toy that will lead to thrilling moments and dreamy memories.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,290 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
